data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Date of payment of Dividend
data.news_body: The payment of Interim Dividend shall be paid on or before February 26 2026.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Fixes Record Date For Interim Dividend
data.news_body: Intimation of Record date for Interim Dividend

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company has approved the Interim Dividend of Rs. 8/- per equity shares of the face value of Rs. 2/- each fully paid up for the Financial Year 2025-26.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Of The Company Held On 28Th January 2026
Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Intimation of Schedule of Earnings Conference Call for investors and analyst for the third quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for The Third Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December 2025.
data.news_body:
Crizac Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 28/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve i. the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated financial results of the Company for the third quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025.
ii. Consider declaration of an Interim Dividend to the equity shareholders of the Company for the Financial Year 2025-26.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: Certificate under Regulation 74(5) of the SEBI (Depositories and Participants)Regulations 2018 for the Quarter ended 31 December 2025

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: This is to inform you that meeting held on 7th January 2026 the board of Directors approved the acquisition of 51.04% of the Equity shares capital of Global Tree Careers Private Limited (GTCPL). The said acquisition is subject to fulfillment of customary conditions precedent including such other conditions as mutually agreed between the parties. Consequent to the completion of the aforesaid acquisition GTCPL will become our Subsidiary of the Company.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: This is to inform you that pursuant to the provision of the Securities and Exchange Board of India(Prohibition of Insider Trading)Regulations 2015 as amended from time to time and the Companys Code of Conduct to regulate monitor and report trading by Insiders of the Company the Trading Window for dealing in Securities of the Company  shall remain closed from 1st January 2026 till the end of 48 hours from the date of declaration of the Un-Audited Financial Result for the Quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025

data.caption: Intimation Regarding The Appointment And Resignation Of A Director On The Board Of A Foreign Unlisted Material Subsidiary Company.
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we inform that Mr. Christopher Flood Nagle is appointed as Director of Crizac Ltd (UK) and Mr. Gaurav Agarwal has resigned from the Directorship with effect from 30th October 2025.

data.news_body: Crizac Ltd (UK) wholly owned subsidiary of the company enters into Definitive Agreements to Acquire Controlling Stake in Studies Planet.com Limited

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 8(2) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Prohibition Of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Crizac Limited has informed to the Exchange regarding Code of Practices and Procedures for fair disclosure of unpublished price sensitive information framed under Regulation 8(1) of SEBI PIT Regulations.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30(5) Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Crizac Limited has informed the Exchange regarding names of Key Managerial Personnel of the Company to determine materiality of the event or information for the purpose of making disclosure to the Stock Exchange(s) under Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR Regulations.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 7(1) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements Regulation) 2015
data.news_body: Crizac Limited has informed the Exchange regarding appointment of MUFG Intime India Private Limited (Formerly known as Link Intime India Private Limited) as the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent and continues to be the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent.

data.caption: Appointment Of Company Secretary & Compliance Officer
data.news_body: This is to inform you that Crizac Limited had appointed Ms. Kashish Arora as Company Secretary and Compliance officer and she continues to be the Compliance officer of the Company under Regulation 6(1) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Crizac Limited has informed the exchange regarding the closure of Trading Window as per SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulation 2015 for approval of Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Crizac Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from July 09 2025 the equity shares of Crizac Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544439) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250708- dated July 08 2025.
